channel.title: Need a little help please
channel.description:
How would I go about putting this (http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php/InfoPanel+(SysMonitor+PLUS)?content=100042) on my computer? Sorry I'm a noob at linux but thats pretty cool and I want to know. Also if you know anymore good gnome theme sites thats welcome too :)
EDIT: just installed screenlets but its not coming up when I go to applications -> accessories how do i run it?
EDIT2: 50 views and no help? cmon!
